Dragon’s blood trees and desert roses grow on rocky plateaus, making the landscape feel like a living science‑fiction world.</description> </biome> <biome> <name>Western Ghats</name> <image url="https://www.shutterstock.com/image-photo/mountains-mist-panoramic-photo-1x2-western-388287280" /> <description>India’s Western Ghats catch monsoon rains that feed forests, rivers, and waterfalls. These mountains shelter rich wildlife, from frogs and orchids to big mammals, across a long, green ridge.</description> </biome> <biome> <name>Lut Desert</name> <image url="https://www.shutterstock.com/image-photo/panoramic-view-serene-sunset-over-amazing-2259804093" /> <description>Iran’s Lut Desert is a land of intense heat and wind‑carved shapes. Giant dunes and yardang ridges stretch for miles, showing how wind and sun can sculpt the Earth.</description> </biome> <biome> <name>Borneo Rainforest</name> <image url="https://www.shutterstock.com/image-photo/aerial-view-borneo-jungle-stunning-tropical-1449811805" /> <description>Borneo’s rainforest is ancient and towering, with a thick canopy and steamy air. Orangutans, hornbills, and countless insects depend on this dense green world of rivers and trees.</description> </biome> <biome> <name>Altai Mountains</name> <image url="https://www.shutterstock.com/image-photo/stunning-altai-mountains-reflections-on-lake-2596156105" /> <description>The Altai Mountains span rugged peaks, clear lakes, and wide valleys across Central Asia. Snowy ridges, alpine meadows, and wild rivers make this a crossroads of cultures and wildlife.</description> </biome> <biome> <name>Siberian Tundra</name> <image url="https://www.shutterstock.com/image-photo/summer-arctic-cottongrass-tundra-view-hills-1353249020" /> <description>Siberia’s tundra is a treeless plain of moss, lichen, and permafrost. In the short summer, wildflowers bloom and migrating reindeer move across wetlands under long daylight.</description> </biome> <biome> <name>Tibetan Plateau</name> <image url="https://www.shutterstock.com/image-photo/china-tibet-yaks-graze-on-tibetan-1307480644" /> <description>The Tibetan Plateau is a vast highland above many clouds. Cold nights, thin air, and open grasslands shape life here, where yaks graze and distant peaks ring the horizon.</description> </biome> </biomes> </treasuredBiomesPoster>
